page.title: 06PENLLYN CHAPEL,LLANGOLLEN.
page.content: The Chapel was built in 1846 and was originally a{Ragged}School.Mary Thomas and her lamb attended the school made famous by the nursery rhyme composed by an American maid who lived next door to Mary.In the upper room they still have the desk that Mary was supposed to have sat in.Today the chapel belongs to the{Evangelical Free {Church}and is run by members of the congregation.{Services}are held every Sunday at 11.am and 6.pm.After the evening service a coffee bar is open for teenagers.{Sunday School}for children is held at 10.am until 11.am.During the week the chapel is opened on Tuesdays for the children's {Adventurers Club. Women's Fellowship is held on Wednesdays and Bible reading classes on Thursdays.Penllyn Chapel welcomes people from all over the world to join in their services.
